Subskills.name: Overloaded Coil
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of divine storm.

Subskills.name: Charged Cells
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict stasis for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Chaining Storm
Subskills.description: Divine Storm inflicts monsters with zapper causing attacks on the monster to unleash chain lightning.

Subskills.name: Divine Ionization
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict elemental break on hit.

Subskills.name: Voltage Charge
Subskills.description: Chance to gain increased damage return on hit.

Subskills.name: Electron Jump
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to gain increased defense for a short period.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Interference
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to perform an additional storm.

Subskills.name: Blow the Fuse
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to zap enemies hit with lightning bolts.

Subskills.name: Charged Hurricane
Subskills.description: Divine Storm now forms an electrically charged hurricane that whirls to a random direction.

Subskills.name: Overwhelming Power
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by divine storm.

Subskills.name: Precision of the Storm
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using divine storm.

Subskills.name: Dashing Flow
Subskills.description: Divine storm now travels forward for a short distance.

Subskills.name: Eye of the Storm
Subskills.description: Unleash a storm around you dealing area of effect damage and inflicting lightning break. Divine storm now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Bad Omens
Subskills.description: Divine Storm slowly expands from it's casting area unleashing chain lightning on hit. Divine storm now has a cooldown.
